name: Distress Signal (Cor.3, Cringenut)
description:
You play as a police officer who has received a call reporting a disturbance by the old bar. Investigate the area to find out what caused the disturbance.

Controls: A and D to move, right-click to aim, left-click to fire, tab to open inventory, right-click to open item menu.

Made for Scream Jam 2021. Unfortunately, the scope of this project was way too high, so it is very incomplete.

Programming, Art: Cringenut

Music, SFX, Art: Cor.3
